mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MEMO M INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_ID = M.CRTR_ID WHERE M.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT MEMO_ID , MEMO_PID , RCV_ID , CRTR_ID , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , MEMO_CNTNT , READ_YN , DEL_YN , TO_CHAR(MDF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDF_DT , MDFR_ID , SAVE_YN FROM MEMO
ORDER BY CRT_DT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMO (MEMO_ID , MEMO_PID , RCV_ID , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MEMO_CNTNT , READ_YN , DEL_YN , MDF_DT , MDFR_ID , SAVE_YN) VALUES ('MM_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_MEMO_PK.NEXTVAL,6 ,'0') , NULL , #{rcvId} /* 받는사람 */ , #{crtrId} /* 세션에 로그인된 사람 */ , SYSDATE , #{memoCntnt} /* 세션에 적은 내용 */ , 'N' , 'N' , NULL , NULL , 'N')
